artist: Artist: After Andrea Mantegna; Engraver: Unknown Italian, late 15th-early 16th century; Artist: Formerly attributed to Zoan Andrea; Artist: Formerly considered copy after Giovanni Antonio da Brescia
catalogue_raissonne: Hind 5a; B.295.1 (as anon. copy after Zoan Andrea); "Andrea Mantegna" 1992 exh., cat. no. 141
provenance: K.E. Hasse, Lugt 860 (1810-1902), Leipzig, Zurich, Heidelberg, Göttingen, Hannover; by descent to his son-in-law, Dr. E. Ehlers, Göttingen (1902-1924, his sale, C.G. Boerner, Leipzig, May 19-23, 1924, no. 278, as Giovanni Antonio da Brescia, for 200 DM). [Colnaghi, London]. [Knoedler, New York, 6.1926, sold to Jones, for $270]
title: Judith with the Head of Holofernes
